Posts.Content: Oh wow, such a long wait. When is ur next appt.? Is it a diagnostic mammogram? The wait is definitely the worst! I'm doing pretty good. Going back to work tomorrow. My follow-up isn't till the 25th when I find out the full pathology and treatment plan but the first wait was far worse than this one. At least I know somewhat what I am dealing with. I'm feeling pretty confident about the results and think I may only have to do RADS. I can handle that and prob. still work. Hope you had a stress-free weekend
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: That sounds awful Pearl. I hope the new antibiotic is working for you. Praying you heal well (hugs)
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: Oh wow, I hope the dr. doing the biopsy says something. My doc says it doesn't look good but there is a slight chance it's a calcification due to my breast implants. He sent me for an emergency mammogram when he saw the lump. The technician said it could be up to two weeks for the results due to the long weekend but I received a call the next morning from both the hospital and the doctor. Still a glimmer of hope but not much. 5 year mark is wonderful! Congratulations Sharon! My mother is not quite 2 years yet.
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: I finally had the biopsy yesterday! They took 10 samples! No the wait for the results. I have a consult with the surgeon on the 30th. He should have the preliminary by then. Fingers crossed!
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: Today must be your birthday then lild4. Hope you have a wonderful day! Good luck tomorrow with the mammogram. I'm feeling pretty good today. I'm going to have a shower and change the dressings so it will be my first time looking under the bandages :S I'm sure it can't be too bad.
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: Is anyone else going this crazy waiting?!
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: I am anxiously waiting my biopsy. i have a 3cm x 4cm irregular hard lump in my breast and a history of cancer. Trying not to obsess but it's so hard.
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: The results from the biopsy was DCIS. I had the lumpectomy and SNB yesterday. I feel pretty good today. Now the two week wait for the results. Here we go again. :S How did your mammogram go lild? What was your Dx uptown?
